author: oshadura
body:
Multiple files should be ignored from modulemap file generation, via hook: X_LOC_FLAGS_IGNORE_MODULE_FILE SCRAM variable, since they are heavily using COND_SERIALIZABLE macro defined in CondFormats/Serialization

The initial CXXModules.mk.files was changed  to make easier grouping of modules and related to them hacks to enable modules.

This PR should be merged after https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/29040

CC: @davidlange6 @vgvassilev
title: Enable Condformats C++ modules
